function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of empathy and understanding from leaders towards employees' work-life balance concerns","Impact":"Decreased morale, productivity, and retention among employees","Mitigation":"Provide empathy training for leaders and encourage open communication with employees","Technologies":"Employee engagement platforms for feedback and communication","People":"Employees, organizational leaders","Owner":"Human Resources, Organizational Leaders"},{"Description":"Mental health challenges due to pandemic-related emotional impact","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and reduced mental well-being among employees","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and counseling facilities, promote work-life balance, and encourage open discussions about mental health","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for virtual counseling, mental health apps for self-care, and communication tools for support groups","People":"Employees","Owner":"Human Resources, Mental Health Counselors"},{"Description":"Inadequate communication and training on safety protocols and new skills for employees returning to work","Impact":"Risk of safety incidents, employee anxiety, and decreased confidence in the workplace","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accessible communication of safety measures, training on new skills, and resources for emotional support","Technologies":"E-learning platforms for training, multilingual communication tools, and safety monitoring systems","People":"Employees, Management","Owner":"Health and Safety Team, Training Department"}]}
